description: Allows you to update the status of a sync blocker, resolving the blocker and allowing syncing to continue.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the sync blocker to be updated.

parameters.name: SyncType
parameters.description: The sync type of the sync blocker to be updated.

parameters.name: ResourceName
parameters.description: The name of the resource for the sync blocker to be updated.

parameters.name: ResolvedReason
parameters.description: The reason for resolving the sync blocker.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The resource name for the sync blocker.

nested_items.name: ParentResourceName
nested_items.description: The parent resource name for the sync blocker.

nested_items.name: SyncBlocker
nested_items.description: Information about the sync blocker to be updated.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID for a specific sync blocker.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status for a specific sync blocker.

nested_items.name: CreatedReason
nested_items.description: The provided reason for a specific sync blocker.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The creation time for a specific sync blocker.

nested_items.name: Contexts
nested_items.description: The contexts for a specific sync blocker.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key provided for a context key-value pair for a specific sync blocker.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value provided for a context key-value pair for a specific sync blocker.

nested_items.name: ResolvedReason
nested_items.description: The resolved reason for a specific sync blocker.

nested_items.name: ResolvedAt
nested_items.description: The time that a specific sync blocker was resolved.
